p: We congratulate and thank the AVS10 2019 organising committee for their efforts in delivering a highly successful meeting led by AVS10 Meeting Convenor, A/Prof Merilyn Hibma and co-Convenor Dr. John Taylor (AVS10 co-Convenor), both based in New Zealand. Members of the organising committee ( Figure 6) and their portfolios are listed on Table 3 Our team was ably supported by Michelle Miller and Jody Peters from Leishman Associates, who were instrumental in running a professional meeting. Finally, AVS10 would not have been possible without the generous support from our sponsors.
